class.name: ShapeBase
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: This class acts as a base for drawn Shapes and should not be instanced directly.
class.property: The CanvasEx object used to render the shape

method.name: moveTo
method.description: Moves a shape to the given position.
method.param: The x position to move to
The y position to move to
The time in milliseconds to complete the move

method.name: putBack
method.description: Moves the shape to starting position.

method.name: getRect
method.description: Gets information about the bounding rectangle of the shape.

method.name: centerTo
method.description: Moves the shape to the center of another shape
method.param: The object to move this object to the center of.
The time in milliseconds to complete the move.

method.name: overlaps
method.description: Checks to see if two shapes are overlapping
method.param: The shape to check to see if this shape is over
True/False should only the center of the shape be considered.
